content: कर्क {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृ-क <ls>Uṇ. 3. 40</ls>] {@--1@} White. {@--2@} Good, excellent. --र्कः {@--1@} A crab. {@--2@} Cancer, the fourth sign of the zodiac. {@--3@} Fire. {@--4@} A water-jar. {@--5@} A mirror. {@--6@} A white horse. [<ab>cf.</ab> Pers. {%kark%}; <ab>L.</ab> {%cancer%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%korkinos%}].
